name: G. William JACOBS and Lillian E. Jacobs, Appellants, v. NETHER PROVIDENCE TOWNSHIP

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: G. William JACOBS and Lillian E. Jacobs, Appellants, v. NETHER PROVIDENCE TOWNSHIP.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted. 55 Pa.Cmwlth. 142, 423 A.2d 442 (1980).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Leonard J. Tripodi, Media, for appellant.
John W. Wellman, Media, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
453 A.2d 336
G. William JACOBS and Lillian E. Jacobs, Appellants, v. NETHER PROVIDENCE TOWNSHIP.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 6, 1982.
Decided Dec. 29, 1982.
Leonard J. Tripodi, Media, for appellant.
John W. Wellman, Media, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
